description: This CSS file manages theme variables and styles for the interactive Tic Tac Toe application, providing light and dark theme support along with responsive design for elements like buttons and headers.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main application container styling with properties for alignment, background color, and font color.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the header of the application, including background color, layout, and font size.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links in the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including position, background color, and hover effects.
